fr.uv1.bd

Class PariManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.uv1.bd.PariManager

  • public class PariManager
extends java.lang.Object
    DAO class (Data Access Object) for the Bet class. This class provides the CRUD functionalities :
    • C: create a new bet in the database.
    • R: retrieve (or read) a (list of)bet(s) from the database.
    • U: update the values stored in the database for a bet.
    • D: delete a bet in the database.
    Author:
    Philippe TANGUY

    • Method Detail

      • persist

        public static Pari persist(Pari pari)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                           ExistingSubscriberException,
                           BadParametersException,
                           ExistingCompetitionException
        Store a bet in the database for a specific subscriber (the subscriber is included inside the Bet object). This bet is not stored yet, so his id value is NULL. Once the bet is stored, the method returns the bet with the id value setted.
        Parameters:
        bet - the bet to be stored.
        Returns:
        the bet with the updated value for the id.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        ExistingSubscriberException
        BadParametersException
        ExistingCompetitionException

      • findById

        public static Pari findById(java.lang.Integer id)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Find a bet by his id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the bet to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the bet or null if the id does not exist in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
